message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $70. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $77.50?

I understand you're still hesitant, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $81.25. It's getting close to the minimum I'm willing to accept, but I think it's still a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $79?
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I'm still not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $80.50. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $80.50, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $80?
